amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the CFTC from compelling the production of algorithmic trading source code and similar intellectual property unless it has issued a subpoena.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 115-3 to prohibit the CFTC from compelling the production of algorithmic trading source code and similar intellectual property unless it has issued a subpoena.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Duffy.
